homePortfolio.name: Sergio Villa.
homePortfolio.subtitle: I develop technology
homePortfolio.content: I’m a Software Developer specializing in building digital solutions. I’m passionate about how software and hardware products that help people and companies to improve their tecnhological experiences.

aboutPortfolio.arrAbout: Sergio Villa works as a Software Developer and he’s been responsible for the analysis, design and development of different apis, also he’s helping build the workflow for diferents modern webs. He’s passionate about software with best practices, clean code and unit testing and how it interacts with different devices, so he’s always looking for participate in projects that impact society.
arrThoughts: If you can imagine it you can program it
I am an engineer, some solution will occur to me
You choose where you go, nothing should stop you.

projects.title: Paraiso Web
projects.info: More than website, includes instagram posts obtained through the use of InstagramAPI

projects.title: Sportt Ecommerce
projects.info: A custom e-commerce, designed to meet the specific needs of the client

projects.title: Aula 365
projects.stack: Angular, Material UI, Django Rest, Docker, GCP
projects.info: A simple basic crud , where comunicate backend and frontend for course registrations

projects.title: Negocio Smart
projects.stack: Django-rest, Angular, GCP, Docker, Tailwind, Material UI
projects.info: This app allows you to keep intelligent control of your purchases and their respective payments, also you could manage suppliers and products

projects.title: Signature Detector
projects.info: This app allows you detect signature sections in physical documents; the images have previously been cropped, filtered and adapted to enter the Yolo Network

projects.title: Dataframe Viewer
projects.info: From a dataframe you can order and filter by its columns

projects.title: MiniTienda
projects.info: Quick product creation project in django with list view with pages and details view per product

projects.title: Detector-Enteldocs
projects.info: Generation of a tool that allowed us detect signature sections in manual reports using OpenCV to  a trained convolutional neural network(Yolo)

projects.title: volume variation using mediapipe
projects.info: Python script that allows you to control the computer volume using gestures

contactPortfolio.content1: Thanks for stopping by, I’m currently looking to join a new team of creative developers. Ask for my resume or see if we can build something amazing together?
contactPortfolio.content2: I’d love to hear from you!
